website_summaries.verdict: A multipurpose tool perfect for smaller tubes and flexible, soft materials that don't require too much force to cut.
pros: Ergonomic handle makes it comfortable to hold and use for long periods of time
Ratchet device makes it adjustable to different tube diameters
cons: Not the strongest tool compared to other pipe cutters

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic PVC Cutter
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands, so I was worried about being able to easily use this tool, but it was no problem at all. It worked amazingly well! I used it to cut 1/2" PVC for a sprinkler line I put in, and it cut through it without any problem at all. It's very well made and heavy, and the ratcheting action takes all of the stress off of your hands. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie H.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: This cutter worked perfectly from the start. I bought two of these cutters from two different suppliers and the other one does not work well at all. The "point" on the blade of this one hits the 1/2" pipe perfectly and works well on 1" PVC as well. The other cutter simply squashed the pipe before cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, I use it for small projects like making dog toys and agility equipment, the cut is smooth however it’s hard to make it even due to the cutting motion, but since I don’t need the edge to be absolutely even it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for an irrigation project for my planters, which we finished today. While he was intently cutting the pipe, I told him I wanted to write a review about the pipe cutter for Amazon and did he like it? He laughed and said, "Oh yes." That's all I got, but from my husband, I knew it meant 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Cuts thru like butter!!
customer_reviews.text: This cutter is great!! I broke my PVC piping under my reef aquarium and didn't want to spend a ton of time sawing it, so I got this cutter because I needed something quick but easy. The racheting feature is great and it cuts thru PVC pipe like butter. The only drawback I had with the cutter is that I have yet to master a completely straight cut on it. My cuts have been slightly angled but for the price and ease of use, this cutter is great. I just have to practice with it to get straight cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Hunawill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome PVC cutting tool
customer_reviews.text: For me to leave a review something he's to be either totally rad or complete junk. These cutters fall into the totally rad category and I wish I would have bought them a long time ago. They slice through pvc pipe like a hot knife through butter. Worth every penny and much better than the regular cheapo cutters. 5 stars all day---Dutch
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for price paid
customer_reviews.text: Used this for some small work in my yard relocating a few spray heads. Cut very well and cleanly. Blade is sharp, actually scares me at times. Put your finger in there and clamp down, it will have the same fate as the shorten tubing. Overall the cutter is a great product, I just did not like the ratcheting motion much. Would prefer a more swift, scissors like cut. At times I would loose my place while cutting due to the multiple ratchets need to bring the blade to full cutting position.
customer_reviews.author: intelignt donky

customer_reviews.title: It works, but its really cheap
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it works. However, it is easy to get stuck at both the top and bottom of the process when cutting and releasing, and its really flimsy with side-to-side movement from the swivel points of the tool. Overall, yea - its doesn't cost a lot but really - you want the tool to last long enough to get through an entire job without injuring yourself or mangling the cuts. With the glowing reviews - really needs to be a bit of serious tool testing on these things.
customer_reviews.author: ForrestA

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for PC cooling soft tubing.
customer_reviews.text: I found that the ratchet mechanism doesn't bite properly unless you open the handle up fully and push on the back of the blade before starting the cut. Also item is big and slightly unwieldy, I have medium large hands. I got this one primarily because it was a ratchet and it has a curved blade. For my needs though, I will revert to another curved non-ratchet tool. I think this is really designed for heavy duty or industrial use only, and for that purpose, its probably excellent.
customer_reviews.author: devtank

customer_reviews.title: Regrettable Purchase, Thumbs Down
customer_reviews.text: I got this for 1” Schedule 40 irrigation lines, and it was not effective for making dozens of cuts. In the end, I went to a local big box hardware store and got a much more effective cutter for a couple of bucks more. The ratcheting teeth seem too far apart, so it doesn’t grab well after each handle squeeze. I had to push the blade end with my free hand to get enough blade movement to catch the next ratchet tooth, which defeats the purpose of this tool and is probably a safety risk (along with the pinch point many others have mentioned in their reviews).
customer_reviews.author: Darth Fader

customer_reviews.title: Not able to Make Square Cuts in PVC
customer_reviews.text: This cutter has a blade that wobbles all over the place. If you try to tighten it up, then it will not ratchet and still noes not cut straight. The Guide for the blade appears to be to sloppy so blade moves. Especially at the end. I tried several different suggestions to get a straight cut. including trying to score pipe. The blade just went at an angle half way through PVC. It was reduced fro 39.99 to 9.95 when I bought it. So I thought a good buy. NO WAY. They reduced it to off load it. Do not buy. Look for a better tool.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one cut... doesn’t cut

Noticed the crappy rivet jobs to hold the moving parts together. First cut worked alright; 2nd cut wouldn’t go easily so I forced it a little bit it cut but not flushed, 3rd cut didn’t happen and after working it over and over it cut with a snap instead of a clean cut. I gotta buy a new pipe. Don’t waste your money *Maybe I got a used defective tool that was returned and they sent out without fixing, don’t know. Would not buy again.

product_meta.title: XOOL Pipe and Tube Cutter, Ratcheting Hose Cutter One-hand Fast Pipe Cutting Tool with Ratchet Drive for Cutting Less Than 1-1/4" O.D. PEX, PVC, and PPR Pipe, Ideal for Plumbers, Home Handy Man
feature_bullets: 【Wide Application】 XOOL Tube Cutter is ideal for use on a variety of plastic pipe and tube. It is an awesome tool. It is an essential cutting tool for your home handy man, plumbers, electricians, and vehicle mechanics. The cutter is commonly used for cutting most kinds of plastic (PVC, CPVC, PP, PEX, PE, rubber hose) and multilayer tubing. Cutting capacity is less than 1-1/4" outer diameter. It is very useful and fine.

【High Quality and Safety】 The durable tube cutter is made of manganese steel that is high hardness, good toughness, strength and durable. It has a strong, solid, but not too heavy design. And our blade is imported from Japan. It process heat-treated to make blade more sharp, durable and not easy to break. At the same, it is not easy rusting. Ratchet drive design makes sure auto-locking function in the process of cutting, which protects users away from hurt because blade bounces back.

【Ergonomics Design】 The professional tube cutter adopts ratchet drive technology to greatly save your strength. Powerful and do not require much strength to cut pipe. The powerful bite force makes the work easier. Fish handle is for added comfort, which guarantee on long-lasting working. The tube cutter can improve work efficiency by fast cutting. User can cut pipe within 5 to 20 seconds, which greatly save times.

【Convenient Storage】 In the bottom of tube cutter, there have a stainless buckle. When you don’t use it, you can buckle the safe lock. The tube cutter will become small to save your space. And it will also become portable, which is convenient for your work and life.

【Excellent Product Performance】 The unique design of tube cutter allows for use with one hand and gives you the ability to cut out straight, clean and burr-free pipe. XOOL tube cutter adopts the install mode of combination bolts with nuts. You can easily disassemble and replace the razor-sharp blade. Convenient spring tension gives superior power and comfort, fits your palm and allows for maximum force output. Comfortable design for easy cutting and less hand fatigue.
